column2: and they're all very active. they, uh, my two older boys are still out running around. they have a, a four year old and a two year old. and i, i run a mile on the treadmill on saturday mornings and on sunday afternoon i start. i run about three miles, but on saturday i start again on sunday morning i start at about six and a boy and a girl.
